name: A.D.A. Another Desktop Adventure
description:
The game is set on my desk and in the surrounding areas where the protagonist will attempt to seek some device connected to the internet to complete his task. Unfortunately, the home router has exploded and then computers, handhelds and the other devices will be completely disconnected from the internet! But surely there will be something that will be right for him! Or at least we hope!

  • Point and click adventure, but not only
  • A lot of levels -Puzzles to overcome to advance
  • Multilanguage (ITALIAN and ENGLISH)
  • 50% of hardware I have at home ...
